name: Forgotten Swamp
description:
Caramel got separated from Ton, guide him through the Swap back to his friend.

Game developed for the 241 Weekly Game Jam: 'Dog Walk'.

Controls:
  • Movement: A and D.
  • Jump: W.
  • Attack : Left click.
  • Fullscreen: F.

PS: Any feedback is welcome!
